sn55.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato hoti.
sn55.24:1.5: Tatra sudaṁ sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.24:1.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:1.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato;
sn55.24:2.1: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn55.24:2.5: Tatra sudaṁ, bhante, sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti—
sn55.24:2.6: acchariyaṁ vata, bho, abbhutaṁ vata, bho.
sn55.24:2.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.24:2.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato;
sn55.24:3.1: “Yo so, mahānāma, dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, so kathaṁ vinipātaṁ gaccheyya.
sn55.24:3.2: Yañhi taṁ, mahānāma, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn55.24:3.3: ‘dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato’ti, saraṇāni sakkaṁ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn55.24:3.4: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato.
sn55.24:4.1: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:4.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:4.6: So āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn55.24:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:5.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:5.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:5.5: hāsapañño javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:5.6: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
sn55.24:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:6.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:6.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.24:6.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:6.6: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
sn55.24:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:7.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.24:7.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti;
sn55.24:7.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:7.6: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇoti.
sn55.24:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.24:8.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti …
sn55.24:8.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.24:8.7: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhānaṁ khamanti.
sn55.24:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṁ agantā tiracchānayoniṁ agantā pettivisayaṁ agantā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ.
sn55.24:9.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti …
sn55.24:9.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato,
sn55.24:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṁ agantā tiracchānayoniṁ agantā pettivisayaṁ agantā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ.
sn55.24:9.9: Ime cepi, mahānāma, mahāsālā subhāsitaṁ dubbhāsitaṁ ājāneyyuṁ, ime cāhaṁ mahāsāle byākareyyaṁ: ‘sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’ti;
sn55.24:9.11: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko maraṇakāle sikkhaṁ samādiyī”ti.
